Seaborn Introduction 1.1 Distribution plot The pandas library supports simple plotting of data, which is very convenient when data is already likely to be in a pandas DataFrame. df['Award_Amount'].plot.hist() plt.show() plt.clf() # <-- Clear out the pandas histogram Seaborn generally does more statistical analysis on data and can provide more sophisticated insight into the data.
